title: Becoming Mrs. Lockwood
description: Every girl has dreams of meeting Prince Charming, or at least I know I did.A fairy tale-like meeting of love at first sight.Real life and fairy tales are very different. I’m just a small town Indiana girl that had a chance encounter with one of Hollywood’s golden boys. You may think you know where this story goes—not even close.Life is different. Marriage is hard. It’s even worse when you’re strangers.
author: K.I. Lynn
